A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Even with a few flaws (e.g.  Camto Bight) I really feel that  The Last Jedi  is one of the best scripted\, acted and thematically interesting movie of the all the films to date. I laughed at most of the jokes\, I shed unexpected tears and most importantly I  could never guess how the story was unfolding. It kept me riveted even through so\,e of the slower parts. Definitely worth watching and see it in the theaters if you can!
